channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fish rubbish outside cafe, 18th July
item.description:
Fika, a lovely local cafe that has been in the area a while and is very popular, is suffering from a really nasty fish smell coming from rubbish that is outside its premises. The rubbish is from the fish shop that has recently opened next door, but there must be some way to more safely dispose of the fish waste, when, especially in hot weather, the strong smell affects everything on the road, and particularly the cafe Fika.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 137, Bellenden Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
